ISSUE.TITLE: Seaweedfs client core dump when calling DeleteFiles
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Sponsors SeaweedFS via Patreon https://www.patreon.com/seaweedfs **Describe the bug** When seaweedfs client calls DeleteFiles (e.g. fileId=123,xxx, volume 123 not exist), it ALWAYS crashes. **Screenshots** goroutine 89 [running]: github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/weed/operation.DeleteFilesWithLookupVolumeId(0xc42061d578, 0x1, 0x1, 0xc4206a4160, 0x20, 0x20, 0xc4206a4140, 0x7fbfd979d1e0, 0x0) github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/weed/operation/delete_content.go:74 +0xce9 github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/weed/operation.DeleteFiles(0xc420286090, 0xe, 0xc42061d578, 0x1, 0x1, 0xc42061d538, 0x4126c8, 0x20, 0x9b9ca0, 0x725201) github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/weed/operation/delete_content.go:36 +0x8a
